thread.title: Rashami Desai goes gaga over her co-stars
thread.title_full: Rashami Desai goes gaga over her co-stars

title: Rashami Desai goes gaga over her co-stars
text:
Rashami Desai goes gaga over her co-stars Shweta Keshri | February 21, 2017 Next Video Visuals of light plane crash into Melbourne shopping mall in Australia Embed Feedback 
Rashami Desai opened up on her equation with co-stars Sidharth Shukla and Jasmin Bhasin in an exclusive interview with India Today Online. She revealed that she used to watch Tashn-e-Ishq just for Jasmin Bhasin and adored her as Twinkle. Rashami and Sidharth's mind-blowing chemistry has been talk of the town since the promos of the show are out. Rashami revealed the secret of their amazing chemistry and also told us how Sidharth is a very good co-actor and a mind-blowing friend. Watch Right Now
